name: Fun Flat Friday
description:
Fun Flat Friday Convince your party guests to stay by placing speakers with their favorite music near them.

Party-Host Pro-Tip: 

The Speakers still work while holding them up

A Game made by
Lukas Büffel (Tech-Art),
Clara Müller (3D/2D Art),
Felix Kolschen (Sound/Musik), and
Pascal Worreschk (Programming)

This game was made in 48 hours for the #BeansJam '22

Theme: Wir müssen wach bleiben (we have to stay awake)
